Author: r00telement
Name: Player Tags
Description: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.
Changelog:
- Added experimental option to apply tags to self in chat.
- Added separate melee and ranged inheritance under dps.
- Added separate magical and physical inheritance under ranged dps.
- Added separate land and hand inheritance under land/land.
- Added option to reset a selected item to its defaults.
